languages.text: "Осторожнее с мясом для арены, Маражай. Если Синисториа недосчитается игрушек для своих бойцов, тебя ждет новое наказание. И, возможно, в этот раз она не сочтет необходимым вернуть тебе твою кожу после того, как ты убьешь выставленных против тебя забавы ради кхимер".

"Careful with the meat for the arena, Marazhai. If Sinisthoria is short on toys for her fighters, you will be punished again. She seems to enjoy pitting you against Khymerae. Maybe this time she won't deem it necessary to give you back your skin after you slay them all."
languages.original_text: "Осторожнее с мясом для арены, Маражай. Если Синисториа недосчитается игрушек для своих бойцов, тебя ждет новое наказание. И, возможно, в этот раз она не сочтет необходимым вернуть тебе твою кожу после того, как ты убьешь выставленных против тебя забавы ради кхимер".

traits.locale_text: "Careful with the meat for the arena, Marazhai. If Sinisthoria is short on toys for her fighters, you will be punished again. She seems to enjoy pitting you against Khymerae. Maybe this time she won't deem it necessary to give you back your skin after you slay them all."
traits.speaker: Abess

traits.locale_text: "Careful with the meat for the arena, Marazhai. If Sinisthoria is short on toys for her fighters, you will be punished again. She seems to enjoy pitting you against Khymerae. Maybe this time she won't deem it necessary to give you back your skin after you slay them all."
traits.speaker: Abess

traits.locale_text: "Careful with the meat for the arena, Marazhai. If Sinisthoria is short on toys for her fighters, you will be punished again. She seems to enjoy pitting you against Khymerae. Maybe this time she won't deem it necessary to give you back your skin after you slay them all."
traits.speaker: Abess

traits.locale_text: "Careful with the meat for the arena, Marazhai. If Sinisthoria is short on toys for her fighters, you will be punished again. She seems to enjoy pitting you against Khymerae. Maybe this time she won't deem it necessary to give you back your skin after you slay them all."
traits.speaker: Abess

languages.text: “玛拉斋，不要乱动竞技场的活畜。要是希斯索莉亚的战士们没有玩具可玩，你就会再次遭到惩罚。她好像特别喜欢让你对付柯美拉，等你再把它们杀光之后，说不定她就不打算再把你的皮缝回去了。”
languages.original_text: "Careful with the meat for the arena, Marazhai. If Sinisthoria is short on toys for her fighters, you will be punished again. She seems to enjoy pitting you against Khymerae. Maybe this time she won't deem it necessary to give you back your skin after you slay them all."

traits.locale_text: “玛拉斋，不要乱动竞技场的活畜。要是希斯索莉亚的战士们没有玩具可玩，你就会再次遭到惩罚。她好像特别喜欢让你对付柯美拉，等你再把它们杀光之后，说不定她就不打算再把你的皮缝回去了。”
traits.speaker: Abess

languages.text: « Pas touche à la viande de l'arène, Marazhai. Si Sinisthoria vient à manquer de jouets pour ses guerriers, tu vas encore être puni. Et comme elle a l'air de beaucoup apprécier te faire affronter Kyméraée... Qui sait, peut-être que cette fois, elle ne jugera pas nécessaire de te rendre ta peau une fois que tu les auras tous tués. »
languages.original_text: "Careful with the meat for the arena, Marazhai. If Sinisthoria is short on toys for her fighters, you will be punished again. She seems to enjoy pitting you against Khymerae. Maybe this time she won't deem it necessary to give you back your skin after you slay them all."

traits.locale_text: « Pas touche à la viande de l'arène, Marazhai. Si Sinisthoria vient à manquer de jouets pour ses guerriers, tu vas encore être puni. Et comme elle a l'air de beaucoup apprécier te faire affronter Kyméraée... Qui sait, peut-être que cette fois, elle ne jugera pas nécessaire de te rendre ta peau une fois que tu les auras tous tués. »
traits.speaker: Abess

languages.text: «Cuidado con la carne de la arena, Marazhai. Como a Sinisthoria le falten juguetes para sus guerreros, volverá a castigarte. Parece que disfruta enfrentándote contra kymeras, y a lo mejor esta vez no te devuelve la piel al matarlas a todas».
languages.original_text: "Careful with the meat for the arena, Marazhai. If Sinisthoria is short on toys for her fighters, you will be punished again. She seems to enjoy pitting you against Khymerae. Maybe this time she won't deem it necessary to give you back your skin after you slay them all."

traits.locale_text: «Cuidado con la carne de la arena, Marazhai. Como a Sinisthoria le falten juguetes para sus guerreros, volverá a castigarte. Parece que disfruta enfrentándote contra kymeras, y a lo mejor esta vez no te devuelve la piel al matarlas a todas».
traits.speaker: Abess

languages.text: 「闘技場用の肉には気をつけろよ、マラズハイ。もしシニストリアでおもちゃの戦士が足りなくなったら、お前はまた罰を受けることになるだろう。彼女はお前をカイメラと戦わせるのを楽しんでいるようだ。今度ばかりは、お前が皆殺しにした後、皮を返す必要はないかもしれないな」
languages.original_text: "Careful with the meat for the arena, Marazhai. If Sinisthoria is short on toys for her fighters, you will be punished again. She seems to enjoy pitting you against Khymerae. Maybe this time she won't deem it necessary to give you back your skin after you slay them all."

traits.locale_text: 「闘技場用の肉には気をつけろよ、マラズハイ。もしシニストリアでおもちゃの戦士が足りなくなったら、お前はまた罰を受けることになるだろう。彼女はお前をカイメラと戦わせるのを楽しんでいるようだ。今度ばかりは、お前が皆殺しにした後、皮を返す必要はないかもしれないな」
traits.speaker: Abess

languages.text: "Vorsichtig mit dem Fleisch für die Arena, Marazhai. Wenn Sinisthoria nicht genügend Spielzeuge für ihre Kämpfer bekommt, werdet Ihr wieder bestraft. Es scheint ihr Spaß zu machen, Euch gegen Khymären kämpfen zu lassen. Vielleicht hält sie es dieses Mal nicht für nötig, Euch Eure Haut zurückzugeben, wenn Ihr sie alle getötet habt."
languages.original_text: "Careful with the meat for the arena, Marazhai. If Sinisthoria is short on toys for her fighters, you will be punished again. She seems to enjoy pitting you against Khymerae. Maybe this time she won't deem it necessary to give you back your skin after you slay them all."

traits.locale_text: "Vorsichtig mit dem Fleisch für die Arena, Marazhai. Wenn Sinisthoria nicht genügend Spielzeuge für ihre Kämpfer bekommt, werdet Ihr wieder bestraft. Es scheint ihr Spaß zu machen, Euch gegen Khymären kämpfen zu lassen. Vielleicht hält sie es dieses Mal nicht für nötig, Euch Eure Haut zurückzugeben, wenn Ihr sie alle getötet habt."
traits.speaker: Abess

languages.text: "Arenaya girecek ete fazla eziyet etme Marazhai. Sinisthoria'nın dövüşçülerine oyuncak kalmazsa yine sen cezalandırılırsın. Seni Kimeralar ile dövüştürmekten zevk alıyor sanki. Belki bu kez hepsini katlettikten sonra derini geri vermeyi gerek görmez."
languages.original_text: "Careful with the meat for the arena, Marazhai. If Sinisthoria is short on toys for her fighters, you will be punished again. She seems to enjoy pitting you against Khymerae. Maybe this time she won't deem it necessary to give you back your skin after you slay them all."

traits.locale_text: "Arenaya girecek ete fazla eziyet etme Marazhai. Sinisthoria'nın dövüşçülerine oyuncak kalmazsa yine sen cezalandırılırsın. Seni Khymerae ile dövüştürmekten zevk alıyor sanki. Belki bu kez hepsini katlettikten sonra sana derini geri vermeye gerek görmez."
traits.speaker: Abess
